profile.name: Javan Makhmali
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building scalable and efficient software solutions with a passion for database sharding
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with expertise in JavaScript, HTML, Node.js, and macOS quarantine utilities. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend Clara Analytics as a potential employer for Javan Makh

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Clara Analytics
description: Designed and developed multiple Node.js applications for macOS quarantine utilities, resulting in a 30% increase in efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement database sharding strategies, improving data scalability by 50%.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple Electron apps for clients across various industries.
Created web development tools using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, resulting in a 25% increase in client satisfaction.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple open source projects, including database sharding implementations and bug fixes.
Improved project visibility by 50% through active participation in community forums.
